title: Убить змея
overview: The mystical series "Kill the Snake" is based on the book by Valery Vainin in the fantasy genre. The forces of Darkness represented by the Snake clan oppose the forces of Light represented by the Mongoose clan. The serpent must build a pyramid, at the head of which he will be able to control humanity. At the base of the pyramid, he gathers talented and influential people, politicians, bandits. Mongoose's task is to figure out the Snake and defeat him before he manages to complete the pyramid. This has happened many times in the history of mankind, and now the Serpent is building his pyramid in the 21st century in Moscow. The mongoose, under the guise of school French teacher Gleb, begins to look for him in order to fight. His friends help him in his search.
